full_description:
\n
About the Role
\n
In this role, you will work with cross-functional partners in the planning, coordination, analysis, communication and execution of corporate project strategy initiatives.
\n
\n
What You’ll Do
\n
\n
Organize and analyze data from all sources, using statistical and other methods to ensure the validity of results
\n
Research and synthesize industry trends, competitive conditions, best practices and benchmarks to create insights and inform strategies
\n
Identify, obtain and analyze required data to support strategy approach and development
\n
Help to identify and assess areas of opportunity
\n
Assist in identifying the tools and design that processes needed to implement new business ideas and concepts
\n
Build quantitative analysis that is based on data inputs, solid calculations and reasoned high-level interpretation
\n
Communicate the results of work to partners in a clear and structured way, both verbally and via documentation
\n
\n
\n
Develop engaging presentations
\n
Support business partners in the curation and communication of pre-read content for the executive committee
\n
\n
\n
Gain knowledge of the business areas supported to add value to projects and portfolios being managed
\n
Additional tasks may be assigned
\n
\n
\n
What Skills You Have
\n
Required
\n
\n
Bachelor’s Degree
\n
1-2+ years related experience as a high-performer
\n
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
\n
Highly proficient with applicable technology systems/tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Qlik)
\n
Strong collaboration skills
\n
Effective written and verbal communication skills
\n
\n
PREFERRED
\n
\n
Experience in retail
\n
Experience in strategy, analytics, large-scale process improvement or related
\n
\n
